message: Looking forward to watching this. A greater awareness is needed when it comes to child sex trafficking. Digital Reasoning’s software made for Thorn has given law enforcement crucial tools in the fights against sex trafficking.

data.description: "48 Hours" Live to Tell: A 15-year-old runs away in search of love only to be held captive by a sex trafficker & Ashton Kutcher opens up about what he’s doing to stop kids from being exploited. CBS News' Michelle Miller reports Saturday, March 31 at 10 p.m. ET/PT on CBS.
data.title: Sneak peek: "48 Hours" Live to Tell: Trafficked
